column2: "Welcome. My name is Leontina, and my job is to help players to learn the best ways to play."
"The \"ARKS Handbook\" contains information on such matters as finding rare weapons, earning Meseta and gaining EXP."
"If you want to learn how to get started, please speak to Astarte. If you want to learn about how to acquire things, please do not hesitate to come to me."
